title: All For Love
lyrics:
8 Contributors
Translations

All For Love Lyrics
[Verse 1]
How do we make it out alive?
Only the open hearts survive
[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, what do we know?
We're standing on the outside
Oh, where do we go from here?
[Chorus]
We're all for love
A love for all
I'll fight for us
And take the fall
How can I make you see no one's the enemy?
How can I make you see this could be heavenly?
We're all for love
[Build]
We're all for love
[Drop]
We're all for love

Only love will be the rеmedy
